xsl:variable.name: textInputTypes
xsl:variable.select: 'text color date datetime datetime-local email month number range search tel time url week'

color.message: Please enter a color in HTML syntax for 'title' (ex: #ffffff)

email.message: 'title' must be a valid email address

tel.message: 'title' must be a valid phone number

time.message: 'title' must be a valid time in 24 hour format (HH:MM)

xsl:variable.name: fyiMessage
xsl:variable.select: 'You have cleared your FYI for this form'

xsl:variable.name: documentDisapprovedMessage
xsl:variable.select: 'Your submission has been disapproved for the following reason(s):'

div.strong: There are some errors in your form:
There are some warnings in your form:

div.p: There are some input fields with invalid data on your form. These fields are not required so you can submit the form now, but those fields will be cleared. If you would prefer to fix the problems please click the "Back to Form" button and correct the fields which have been marked yellow.
Are you sure you wish to cancel this form?
If you reload the document you will lose any unsaved changes. Are you sure you wish to proceed?

xsl:otherwise.div: Could not find template to render

div.div: Please provide an explanation for disapproving this document
